entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
